model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW TestJoinView ( RowId integer, PART_ID string, PART_NAME string, PART_COLOR string, PART_WEIGHT string, SUPPLIER_ID string, QUANTITY bigdecimal, SHIPPER_ID bigdecimal, PRIMARY KEY(RowId) ) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PART_ID), A.PART_ID, A.PART_NAME, A.PART_COLOR, A.PART_WEIGHT, B.SUPPLIER_ID, B.QUANTITY, B.SHIPPER_ID FROM PARTS AS A INNER JOIN SUPPLIER_PARTS AS B ON A.PART_ID = B.PART_ID;

model.name: OracleParts
